question: Write a letter to your local council that the road in front of your house is damaged. In your letter, you should:tell him your name and where you are livingdescribe the problemsuggest what you want him to do for it.
text: I want to draw your immediate attention to the damaged condition of the road in front of my house.
My name is Aditya Bhardwaj and my house address is B-91B Rajat Vihar Sector-62 Noida-201301.

The Road in front of my house is too damaged and full of potholes due to which these days a lot of accidents are taking place causing fatal injuries to people. Also,  these potholes get filled with water during the rainy season and furthermore create more problems for my family and people living in the locality.

I request you to please look into this issue on an urgent basis as this is directly linked to the safety and wellbeing of residents. I would like to suggest a few ideas which would definitely improve the condition of this road. Firstly, the local staff of the council should do some patchwork on an urgent basis so that it restricts anyone from getting injured. Secondly, a tender should be opened for the  construction of the new road. Lastly, the quality of the construction needs to be reviewed by professional engineers and third party agencies.
I hope as being a reputed authority you would take timely action on this issue.
